mapper.select: SELECT sb.source_seq AS sourceSeq, c.code_nm AS codeNm, sb.user_seq AS userSeq, wu.user_id AS userId, sb.title, sb.content, DATE_FORMAT(sb.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regDate FROM source_board sb LEFT OUTER JOIN white_user wu ON wu.user_seq = sb.user_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN code c ON sb.code_seq = c.code_seq WHERE sb.source_seq = #{sourceSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO source_board(user_seq, code_seq, title, content, reg_date) VALUES( #{userSeq}, (SELECT DISTINCT code_seq FROM code WHERE code_key = #{codeKey}), #{title}, #{content}, NOW() )
